title: Digital Tool-Integrated Instructional Design for Strengthening Construction Engineering Mathematics Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering mathematics (linear equations, geometric concepts) and practical experience in construction sites
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen the competency of field professionals in solving mathematical problems occurring at construction sites using digital tools

learning_goals: Learners can derive mathematical solutions using graphing calculators/dynamic geometry software in civil engineering practical problems (e.g., straight-line-based structure design).
Learners enhance geometric problem-solving skills by visualizing 2D/3D spatial concepts using digital tools.
Through project-based assessment, learners can analyze real construction site data and prepare reports on mathematical modeling results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
